title: Refocusing through photography
description:
Sigurður Ólafur Sigurðsson is a commercial photographer born and based in Iceland. He spent his first 20 working years working in and around search, rescue and emergency in Iceland before he turned the page to become a professional photographer. In his talk at TEDxReykjavík, Siggi explores how photography can help us refocus on current issues and make us see things from a new perspective. 

Can a photograph really tell the whole story? Can other people’s images or even your own make you rethink something you thought you already knew? Using examples from his own work with search, rescue and emergency in Iceland and Europe he tries to explain how photography has continued to reshape his view of the world around him. See more of Siggi's commercial work on www.sigosig.com and his SAR related work on www.sosfotos.com.
author: Sigurður Ólafur Sigurðsson
